column1: The Pit Room////3 stars over all but only one star for the pork ribs...extremely dry
column2: tough and not very flavorful. The house-made cheddar jalapeno pork sausage is ok
column3: but the cheese is distributed in big chunks which I didn't like at all. The green beans were good and the potato salad was delicious. The line was deep but moved quite fast. The staff was very efficient and friendly. If I go back
